name: The Dark Hills of Cherai: The Regal Scepter
name_original: The Dark Hills of Cherai: The Regal Scepter
description:
The Dark Hills of Cherai: The Regal Scepter is a puzzle game developed by Big Fish Games. It came out on 03-01-2013. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Dark Hills of Cherai: The Regal Scepter on iOS.
